SHIPPING AND MAILS; Ships Which Arrived Yesterday

docs.snippet: After an uneventful four days, foreign exchanges turned to tremendous activity and wide price swings on Friday of last week during which a number of the currencies established new highs for the year and beyond. This sudden reversal in activity and...
docs.lead_paragraph: After an uneventful four days, foreign exchanges turned to tremendous activity and wide price swings on Friday of last week during which a number of the currencies established new highs for the year and beyond. This sudden reversal in activity and trend sprang from several incidents, one of which was the Administration's request for additional relief funds, and the other the German internal situation.

docs.snippet: The government-owned freighter Algic, which became the center of a Federal inquiry because of the refusal of her crew to work with longshoremen in Montevido, Uruguay, last September, precipitated another Federal investigation yesterday by the Federal...
docs.lead_paragraph: The government-owned freighter Algic, which became the center of a Federal inquiry because of the refusal of her crew to work with longshoremen in Montevido, Uruguay, last September, precipitated another Federal investigation yesterday by the Federal Bureau of Marine Inspection and Navigation at 45 Broadway.
docs.abstract: Fed Marine Inspection Bur to consider charges against J P Buzzell

docs.snippet: John P. Buzzell, a watertender employed on the government-owned freighter Algic, charged yesterday before a committee of inquiry of the Federal Bureau of Marine Inspection and Navigation that an officer of the ship ?? attempted to foment trouble...
docs.lead_paragraph: John P. Buzzell, a watertender employed on the government-owned freighter Algic, charged yesterday before a committee of inquiry of the Federal Bureau of Marine Inspection and Navigation that an officer of the ship ?? attempted to foment trouble among the crew when the ship visited Montevideo, Uruguay, in December, in the hope of inciting action which would be called mutiny.
docs.abstract: Buzzell accuses J E Morton of starting trouble among crew

headline.main: SEAMAN ACCUSES OFFICER OF ALGIC; Watertender Taxes Assistant to Engineer With Attempt to Incite Men to Disorder
